overclocks.name: Super-Slim Rounds
overclocks.description: Same power but in a smaller package, giving slightly better accuracy and letting you fit a few more rounds in each magazine.

overclocks.name: Well-Oiled Machine
overclocks.description: When you need a little more sustained damage.

overclocks.name: EM Refire Booster
overclocks.description: Use the electron circuit of the SMG to boost its fire rate and damage, but the accuracy suffers as a result.

overclocks.name: Light-Weight Rounds
overclocks.description: They don't hit quite as hard and can't handle fast fire rates, but you sure can carry a lot more of them!

overclocks.name: Turret Arc
overclocks.description: Use the Gemini turrets as nodes in an electric arc. Zap! The downside is less ammo and a slower rate of fire.

overclocks.name: Turret EM Discharge
overclocks.description: Shoot a turret to turn it into the epicenter of an electric explosion! The bullet modifications unfortunately also lower the direct damage and magazine size.
